data.body:
Objective: Complete migration and verify parity with no user-facing functionality change.

Notes: Subsystem migrations are parallelizable; regression and boundary checks are release gates.

Assigned tasks:
- Migrate remaining CLI and service callsites to BackendPort
- Migrate automation and background paths to BackendPort
- Replace test utilities with backend-aware fixtures
- Enforce adapter boundary with static check
- Run full regression and parity validation with beads default
- Document backend extension guide for future implementations

data.title: Scene sunset-props: Cutover Verify
